name: Know Your Developer
description: Launched on 09/06/2018 by a team based in The Netherlands, the US, and Malaysia, Know Your Developer aims to address the problem of the relationship between the community and the developer team. We give investors the opportunity to delve into a project through our educational tools. For developers, we have a legalized verification system with which they can verify their ID easily and securely. This service can also be used as a KYC for, for example, a platform or exchange. The KYD hiring platform can be used to hire verified developers to participate in your project.
